stdout:
Table	Create Table
products	CREATE TABLE `products` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `categoryId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `model` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `brand` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `slug` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `specifications` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `price` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `images` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `downloads` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `order` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `isPublished` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `idx_categoryId` (`categoryId`),
  KEY `idx_slug` (`slug`),
  KEY `idx_order` (`order`),
  UNIQUE KEY `slug` (`slug`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=90001
